scripts.build: svelte-kit build && ls; ls node_modules; ls node_modules/prisma; ls node_modules/@prisma tree . ; cp node_modules/prisma/engines/*/*query* .vercel_build_output/functions/node/render/;cp prisma/schema.prisma .vercel_build_output/functions/node/render/
scripts.vercel-build: prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && pnpm run build
